content: {"locationId": "6006", "organizationId": "5084", "name": "Mountain Park Health Center Goodyear", "address1": "140 N Litchfield Rd ", "address2": "", "city": "Goodyear", "state": "AZ", "zipCode": "85338", "country": null, "phone": "602-499-1354", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "33.4481792", "longitude": "-112.3588785", "foodPrograms": "Pop-Up/Mobile Resource", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Near Public Transit", "aboutUs": "We will set up our food distribution in the parking lot right outside of our Clinic.     Cars can begin to line up in the drive-thru line and our volunteers will begin loading cars at 9:00 am.      Please make sure to have your Arizona State Id ready to make the sign-in process easier.     Thank you! :)", "notes": "", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "602-499-1354", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, Curbside Pickup / Drive Through, Outdoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 44, "regionName": "St. Mary's Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "71a2fe75-eba6-4f29-916b-d3614dd69e78.png", "website": "https://www.firstfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "US Mountain Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "MST", "offsetHours": "-7", "schedules": ["Friday 9:00 AM-11:00 AM [ 2nd week(s)]"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
